## Raw data

The raw FR example data is available in the `"data_raw_fr"` dataset:

```{r}
data("data_raw_fr")
head(data_raw_fr) |> 
  mutate(
    across(
      everything(), 
      ~ str_trunc(.x, 20)
    )
  ) |> 
  kable()
```

The DE version is available in the `"data_raw_de"` dataset:

```{r}
data("data_raw_de")
head(data_raw_de) |> 
  mutate(
    across(
      everything(), 
      ~ str_trunc(.x, 20)
    )
  ) |> 
  kable()
```
